build.buildCommand: echo 'NODE VERSION:' && node --version && echo 'NPM VERSION:' && npm --version && echo 'COPYING RAW HTTP...' && cp server/raw-http.js dist/raw-http.js && echo 'BUILD COMPLETE' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'TESTING LOCALLY:' && cd dist && PORT=12345 timeout 2s node raw-http.js || echo 'LOCAL TEST DONE'

deploy.startCommand: echo 'STARTING RAW HTTP SERVER...' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'NODE ENV:' $NODE_ENV && echo 'PORT:' $PORT && echo 'HOST:' $HOST && node dist/raw-http.js
